name: You Are But A Humble Jingle Cat And You Must Take Over The Yogscast
name_original: You Are But A Humble Jingle Cat And You Must Take Over The Yogscast
description:
You are but a humble Jingle Cat and you must TAKEOVER the Yogscast!

A very simple Pokemon-style RPG where you, a humble jingle cat, fight your way through pairs of yogs in order to claim your rightful throne at yogtowers. 
Takes about 3-6 minutes to play. 

Made for the Jingle Cats stream on December 1, 2021 as a part of the Jingle Jam, an annual charity drive by the Yogscast and their community.

Made by SketchThisWave and lookimapengu1 and bism_th, some sounds from freesound.org
